field_description.para: Bits [31:8] of the PMSICR_EL1 interval counter reload value. Software must set this to a nonzero value. If software sets this to zero, an UNKNOWN sampling interval is used. Software should set this to a value greater than the minimum indicated by PMSIDR_EL1.Interval.
Controls randomization of the sampling interval.
The random number generator is not architected.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
